original_text: “The sin of Judah is written with a pen of iron; with a point of diamond it is engraved on the tablet of their heart, and on the horns of their altars,
korean_text: 유다의 죄는 금강석 끝 철필로 기록되되 그들의 마음 판과 그들의 제단 뿔에 새겨졌거늘

sentences.original_text: The sin of Judah is written with a pen of iron
with a point of diamond it is engraved
on the tablet of their heart
and on the horns of their altars
